org.springframework.integration.dsl.support

Class Transformers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.support.Transformers

  • public abstract class Transformers
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class to provide methods for out-of-the-box Transformers.
    Author:
    Artem Bilan
